title: Ten-Spice Mix
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: - 3 tablespoons coriander seeds, toasted and ground
directions: Whisk together the salt, five-spice powder, coriander, garlic powder, chili powder, white pepper, and galangal in a small bowl.
Cover and store in a cool, dark place for up to 6 months.
